column3:
Nice. I think this is very helpful for new devs (and even for old hands).

I would say we should take these new point directly at the 2nd position above of "doxygen comments".
These are gems! Thank you for collecting all these notes. They help a lot!\n
ACK (with or without my suggestions), this is all good stuff.\n
Thanks, these are helpful, especially for folks like me, ramping up on the codebase and planning to start contributing code. \n
@onefire Reasonable nits, but no reason to hold this up, IMHO. Feel free to submit improvements.\n
@onefire While doing so, please fix also the nits I brought. Thank you.\n
very minor nitpick: instead 'pulls', should we make it 'pull requests' ?\n
